title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 01/02 to 11/12, rapidly increasing from 11/12 to 12/13, and lastly gradually constant from 12/13 to 18/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 11/12 and 12/13.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 304.0 was recorded at Year 18/19
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 84.0 was recorded at Year 11/12
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 11/12 to 18/19.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 06/07 to 09/10.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 01/02 to 04/05.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 09/10 to 11/12.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 04/05 to 06/07.
